basics.label: Overnight Pharmacy Technician
basics.summary: Highly motivated and skilled individual with extensive background experience in customer service, administration, retail; long-term care; and hospital pharmacy.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Fill various filled scheduled and stat patient orders, manage inventory, answer calls to assist Pharmacists, compound IVs and chemotherapy orders.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Filled unit dose medications, prepared and refilled various trays for carts, managed Pyxis machine, sterile compounded IV fluids.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Compound all intravenous admixtures, correctly label all IV compounds, scan all orders to designated totes, restock all supplies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed various technician duties including filling, inventory, compounding, and more.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Verified prescriptions, managed medication orders, troubleshooting insurance issues, and handled patient information.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Successfully led and coordinated administrative tasks and school functions.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Cross trained as cashier and wait staff in fast-paced restaurant. Handled large cash amounts and assisted in new employee training.

skills.name: Pharmacy Skills
keywords: Trained in compounding all intravenous and chemotherapy admixtures.
Extensive training in calculating and compounding pediatric admixtures and chemotherapy.
Knowledge of the processes involved in maintaining a sterile environment for compounding IVs.
